about_the_game:
Qubicks is where tower defense meets roguelike in a stunning voxel-based world. Venture across procedurally generated 3D landscapes as you collect and deploy a variety of powerful towers, all drawn from a randomized deck of cards. Defend human researchers from waves of relentless alien inhabitants as you explore the diverse environments of newly discovered planets.

Endless Replayability:

Every run is unique with procedurally generated levels and an ever-expanding roster of unlockable towers, heroes, and achievements.

Strategic Deck-Building:

Mix and match cards to build your perfect defense strategy. Will you focus on high-damage towers, or create a maze to stall your enemies? The choice is yours.

Adaptive Gameplay:

Qubicks is designed to be both challenging and relaxing, offering a satisfying experience for both hardcore gamers and those looking for a casual gaming session.

Unique Heroes & Special Abilities:

Unlock and command a diverse cast of heroes, each bringing their own powerful abilities and playstyles to the battlefield. From summoning elemental storms to boosting tower efficiency, these heroes are your ultimate allies in turning the tide of battle and crafting unforgettable strategies.

Dynamic 3D Environments:

Battle across beautifully rendered voxel planets, each presenting its own set of challenges and surprises.

Event Modes & Challenges:

Take on special events and challenges to unlock exclusive content and prove your tactical prowess.

Why Play Qubicks?

If you're a fan of games that blend strategy with randomness and love the thrill of building your own defenses while adapting to new situations, Qubicks will be your next obsession. It’s perfect for players who appreciate the depth of a roguelike and the strategy of a tower defense game, all packed into a visually striking, voxel art style.

short_description: Qubicks is where tower defense meets roguelike as you venture across procedurally generated levels where you strategically position towers, balancing immediate survival with long-term growth. Upgrade your towers and heroes to adapt to difficult waves and ensure victory against alien inhabitants.
